--- In gladiator@y..., "Rory Wilde" <laughingmadman@h...> wrote:
> i had a legit team of a fighter and a druid. it went thru built in 
and the 
> tev fifty

I am asking because I like my new druid scenario a lot better than my 
last one, but I am not sure a legitimate team can beat without 
cheating unless it has one of the following characters: skeleton, 
ghost, experience level 4 (or higher) cleric, archmage, or mage.

Rory, would you mind testing that new scenario out with a legitimate 
team?  I can't use my own legitimate team because it has 2 clerics, 
mage, and an archmage so that it can handle anything.

I would like to possibly a collection of legitimate teams (through 
saved game files) to help out when it comes time to test scenarios.
